description: Mobile techniques used by Gooligan, ATT&CK software S0290 v1.2
name: Gooligan (S0290)

techniques.comment: [Gooligan](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0290) steals authentication tokens that can be used to access data from multiple Google applications.(Citation: Gooligan Citation)
[Gooligan](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0290) executes Android root exploits.(Citation: Gooligan Citation)
[Gooligan](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0290) can install adware to generate revenue.(Citation: Gooligan Citation)
